directions: Heat olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat, and saute the tuna until heated through.
In a medium bowl, toss together tuna, salad greens, apple, and mandarin oranges.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and diced
1 (11 ounce) can mandarin orange segments, drained
title: Tuna  and Mandarin Salad
